text: Rakhimov: *Baxtiyor Rahimov (born c. 1963), rebel leader in Uzbekistan who advocates an Islamic republic *Murtaza Rakhimov (born 7 February 1935), President of the Republic of Bashkortostan, Russia *Rashid Rakhimov (born 18 March 1965), Tajikistani football coach and former footballer *Gafur Rakhimov (born 22 July 1951), businessman and alleged crime lord *Sobir Rakhimov (or Sabir Rakhimov), Uzbek general and hero of USSR during World War II
title: Rakhimov
